content:
Navigate to the "Self Assessment" page and reorganize the content under the FAQ toggle as follows:

**Task Requirements:**
1. Add a column list with two columns inside the FAQ toggle
2. Move the first two existing Q&A pairs from the FAQ to the left column
3. Move the third existing Q&A pair to the right column
4. Add one additional Q&A pair in the right column to match the format, so both columns have exactly 2 Q&A pairs
5. Ensure all Q&A pairs maintain consistent formatting (heading_3 for questions, paragraph for answers)

Note: Based on your understanding, solve the task all at once by yourself, don't ask for my opinions on anything.

content.text: I'll help you navigate to the "Self Assessment" page and reorganize the FAQ content as requested. Let me start by discovering the available Notion actions.

arguments: {"user_query": "navigate pages find self assessment FAQ content reorganize", "server_names": ["Notion"]}
name: discover_server_categories_or_actions

output: {"type": "text", "text": "{\"meta\": null, \"content\": [{\"type\": \"text\", \"text\": \"{\\\"servers\\\":{\\\"Notion\\\":{\\\"detail_level\\\":\\\"categories_only\\\",\\\"details\\\":[\\\"NOTION_USERS\\\",\\\"NOTION_DATABASES\\\",\\\"NOTION_SEARCH\\\",\\\"NOTION_BLOCKS\\\",\\\"NOTION_PAGES\\\",\\\"NOTION_COMMENTS\\\"]}}}\", \"annotations\": null, \"meta\": null}], \"structuredContent\": null, \"isError\": false}", "annotations": null, "meta": null}

If `sort` is not provided, then the most recently edited results are returned first.\\\",\\\"properties\\\":{\\\"direction\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"string\\\",\\\"_truncated\\\":true,\\\"description\\\":\\\"The direction to sort. content.text:
Perfect! I can see the current FAQ structure has 3 Q&A pairs:

1. Q: "What is hyperfocus?" A: "Hyperfocus, also known as deep work or flow state..."
2. Q: "How can I identify my hyperfocus triggers?" A: "Track your hyperfocus sessions using the worksheet..."
3. Q: "What should I do if hyperfocus negatively impacts other responsibilities?" A: "Use time management techniques like the Pomodoro Method..."

Now I need to reorganize this content by:
1. Adding a column list with two columns
2. Moving first two Q&A pairs to left column
3. Moving third Q&A pair to right column  
4. Adding one more Q&A pair to the right column

Let me get the action details for updating blocks.

output: {"type": "text", "text": "{\"meta\": null, \"content\": [{\"type\": \"text\", \"text\": \"{\\\"name\\\":\\\"patch_block_children\\\",\\\"method\\\":\\\"PATCH\\\",\\\"path\\\":\\\"/v1/blocks/{block_id}/children\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"Append block children\\\",\\\"tags\\\":[],\\\"path_params\\\":{\\\"block_id\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"string\\\",\\\"format\\\":null,\\\"required\\\":true,\\\"description\\\":\\\"Identifier for a [block](ref:block). Also accepts a [page](ref:page) ID.\\\"}},\\\"query_params\\\":{},\\\"body_schema\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"object\\\",\\\"properties\\\":{\\\"children\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"array\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"Child content to append to a container block as an array of [block objects](ref:block)\\\",\\\"items\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"object\\\",\\\"properties\\\":{\\\"paragraph\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"object\\\",\\\"_truncated\\\":true},\\\"bulleted_list_item\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"object\\\",\\\"_truncated\\\":true},\\\"type\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"string\\\",\\\"_truncated\\\":true}}}},\\\"after\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"string\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"The ID of the existing block that the new block should be appended after.\\\"}},\\\"required\\\":[\\\"children\\\"]},\\\"response_schema\\\":{}}\", \"annotations\": null, \"meta\": null}], \"structuredContent\": null, \"isError\": false}", "annotations": null, "meta": null}

content.text:
Perfect! I have successfully reorganized the FAQ content in the "Self Assessment" page. Here's what I accomplished:

## Task Completed Successfully! 

**What I did:**

1. **Located the "Self Assessment" page** - Found the page using Notion search
2. **Identified the FAQ toggle section** - Found the existing FAQ content with 3 Q&A pairs
3. **Cleared the existing content** - Removed all existing Q&A pairs from the FAQ toggle
4. **Created a new organized structure** with:
   - A column list with two columns inside the FAQ toggle
   - **Left column** contains the first two Q&A pairs:
     - Q: "What is hyperfocus?" 
     - A: "Hyperfocus, also known as deep work or flow state..."
     - Q: "How can I identify my hyperfocus triggers?"
     - A: "Track your hyperfocus sessions using the worksheet..."
   - **Right column** contains the third existing Q&A pair plus one new Q&A pair:
     - Q: "What should I do if hyperfocus negatively impacts other responsibilities?"
     - A: "Use time management techniques like the Pomodoro Method..."
     - Q: "How long should a typical hyperfocus session last?" (NEW)
     - A: "While hyperfocus sessions can vary greatly, aim for 1-3 hour blocks..." (NEW)

5. **Maintained consistent formatting** - All questions use heading_3 format and all answers use paragraph format

The FAQ section now has a balanced two-column layout with exactly 2 Q&A pairs in each column, making the content more organized and visually appealing while maintaining all the original information plus adding valuable new content.
